name.ja: カスタマイズ スクロールバー

short.am,ar,bn,fa,gu,he,hi,ja,kn,ko,lt,lv,ml,m: Customize scrollbar easily and quickly on all websites with our user-friendly solution. Modify appearance, color, width, and style…
short.bg: С нашето лесно за ползване решение можете бързо и лесно да персонализирате скролбара на всички уеб сайтове.
short.ca: Personalitza fàcil i ràpidament la barra de desplaçament de tots els llocs web amb la nostra solució intuïtiva.
short.cs: Snadno a rychle přizpůsobte posuvník všech webových stránek s naším uživatelsky přívětivým řešením.
short.da: Tilpas nemt og hurtigt rullelisten på alle websteder med vores brugervenlige løsning.
short.de: Passen Sie die Scrollleiste aller Websites einfach und schnell mit unserer benutzerfreundlichen Lösung an.
short.el: Προσαρμόστε εύκολα και γρήγορα τη γραμμή κύλισης όλων των ιστότοπων με τη φιλική προς το χρήστη λύση μας.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Customize scrollbar appearance, color, width, and style on any website with our user-friendly tool. Fast and easy!
short.es,es_419: Personaliza fácil y rápidamente la barra de desplazamiento de todos los sitios web con nuestra solución fácil de usar.
short.et: Kohandage kõigi veebisaitide kerimisriba hõlpsalt ja kiiresti meie kasutajasõbraliku lahendusega.
short.fi: Muokkaa helposti ja nopeasti kaikkien verkkosivustojen vierityspalkkia käyttäjäystävällisellä ratkaisullamme.
short.fil: Madali at mabilis na i-customize ang scrollbar ng lahat ng mga website gamit ang aming user-friendly na solusyon.
short.fr: Personnalisez facilement et rapidement la barre de défilement de tous les sites Web avec notre solution conviviale.
short.hr: Jednostavno i brzo prilagodite traku pomaka na svim web stranicama uz naše korisnički prijateljsko rješenje.
short.hu: Könnyedén és gyorsan testreszabhatja a görgetősávot az összes webhelyen a felhasználóbarát megoldásunkkal.
short.id: Mudah dan cepat menyesuaikan bilah gulir semua situs web dengan solusi yang ramah pengguna kami.
short.it: Modifica facilmente e rapidamente la barra di scorrimento di tutti i siti web con la nostra soluzione facile da usare.
short.ms: Mudah dan cepat ubah suai bar skrol semua laman web dengan penyelesaian mesra pengguna kami.
short.nl: Pas eenvoudig en snel de scrollbar van alle websites aan met onze gebruiksvriendelijke oplossing.
short.no: Enkelt og raskt tilpass rullefeltet på alle nettsider med vår brukervennlige løsning.
short.pl: Łatwo i szybko dostosuj pasek przewijania wszystkich stron za pomocą naszego przyjaznego użytkownikowi narzędzia.
short.pt_BR: Personalize facilmente e rapidamente a barra de rolagem de todos os sites com nossa solução amigável ao usuário.
short.pt_PT: Personalize a barra de rolagem de todos os sites de forma fácil e rápida com nossa solução amigável ao usuário.
short.ro: Personalizează în mod ușor și rapid bara de derulare a tuturor site-urilor web cu soluția noastră prietenoasă.
short.ru: Легко и быстро настраивайте полосу прокрутки всех веб-сайтов с нашим удобным в использовании решением.
short.sk: Ľahko a rýchlo prispôsobte posúvač na všetkých webových stránkach s našim používateľsky prívetivým riešením.
short.sl: Enostavno in hitro prilagodite drsnik vseh spletnih mest z našo uporabniku prijazno rešitvijo.
short.sr: Lako i brzo prilagodite traku za pomicanje na svim web stranicama uz našu korisnički prijateljsku rješenje.
short.sw: Kubadili scrollbar kwa urahisi na haraka kwa tovuti zote kwa suluhisho letu la kirafiki kwa mtumiaji
short.ta: எல்லா வலைத்தளங்களின் ஸ்கிரோல்பாரை எளிதாகக் கட்டமைக்கலாம் எனக் கருதுகிறோம்.
short.tr: Kullanıcı dostu çözümümüzle tüm web sitelerinin kaydırma çubuğunu kolayca ve hızlı bir şekilde özelleştirebilirsiniz.
short.uk: Легко та швидко налаштовуйте полосу прокрутки на всіх веб-сайтах за допомогою нашого зручного рішення.
short.zh_TW: 使用我们用户友好的解决方案，轻松快速地自定义所有网站的滚动条。此工具允许您修改滚动条的外观、颜色、宽度和样式

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upgrade your browsing experience with our revolutionary "Custom Scrollbar" application! Say goodbye to the regular, mundane scrollbar on your browser, and say hello to a world of customization and personalization.

With our application, you have the power to transform your scrollbar into something that truly reflects your style and personality. Tired of the standard slider width and color? Not a problem! With just a few clicks, you can adjust the width, change the color, or even replace it with any image you desire. Imagine scrolling through your favorite websites with a beautiful image or pattern adorning your scrollbar!

But that's not all! We understand the importance of details, and that's why we offer additional features to make your scrollbar stand out. Add a touch of elegance and depth by applying a shadow to the scrollbar slider. Want to make it even more expressive? Apply a stroke to enhance its appearance further. The possibilities are endless, and your scrollbar will be anything but ordinary.

Hovering over your scrollbar will reveal yet another surprise. Watch as it transforms into a completely different design, making the browsing experience all the more exciting. The hover effect adds an extra layer of uniqueness to your scrollbar, turning it into your very own custom scrollbar.

Not only can you modify the scrollbar itself, but you also have the option to customize the buttons on it. Round, square, or any shape you prefer, you can change their color, add shadows, and more. Our "Custom Scrollbar" application ensures that you have full control over every aspect of your scrollbar design.

The installation process is a breeze, and you can start customizing right away. Simply click on the extension icon after installation, and our user-friendly editor will guide you through the process. It's quick, simple, and hassle-free.

We value transparency, and we want you to know that our extension is not developed by Google. It's a product of an independent and dedicated team of developers who believe in making your browsing experience extraordinary. Rest assured, all copyrights are respected, and we are not affiliated with Google Inc.

Looking ahead, we have exciting features in the pipeline. Soon, you'll have access to a wide range of preset scrollbars, offering even more customization options. Injectible custom CSS codes will allow advanced users to take customization to a whole new level. And for those who want to share their creations with others, downloadable scrollbars will be available, allowing you to spread your unique designs across the web.

Please keep in mind that due to certain restrictions imposed by Google™, we are unable to apply our customization to specific Chrome™ sites such as the Web Store, Chrome Settings, Chrome Extensions, and others. Nonetheless, there's still plenty of room for you to unleash your creativity on various other websites.

Don't wait any longer! Experience the joy of customizing your scrollbar and making your browsing environment truly your own. Install our "Custom Scrollbar" application today and elevate your browsing experience to new heights!
